ch0243_40_yuri/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey! I’ve been looking for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_40_yuri/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on! Let’s grab a bowl of curry and start our
day off with a zing!
ch0243_40_yuri/7101_0701_01_10:
Marnie and I may be rivals, but we’re also really
good friends!
ch0243_40_yuri/7101_0701_02_10: Look! We even bought matching hair clips together!
ch0243_40_yuri/7101_0701_03_10:
Maybe you and I can shop around for something
to match each other, too!
ch0243_40_yuri/7102_0701_01_10:
Back when my Inteleon was still a wee Sobble,
he’d break down in tears the moment I left
his side.
ch0243_40_yuri/7102_0701_02_10:
Hard to believe if you look at him now, eh?
He’s so grown-up and mature!
ch0243_40_yuri/7102_0701_03_10: I was so ecstatic when he evolved...
ch0243_40_yuri/7102_0701_04_10:
but every now and again, I find myself missing
how he used to be. Strange, isn’t it.
ch0243_40_yuri/7103_0701_01_10:
Hey! Do you want to go hang out at the beach
with me?
ch0243_40_yuri/7103_0701_02_10:
We can go for a swim, splash around together,
build a sand castle...
ch0243_40_yuri/7103_0701_03_10: and then finish it off with a tasty bowl of curry!
ch0243_40_yuri/7103_0701_04_10:
Curry tastes especially great after playing
out in the sun all day!
ch0243_40_yuri/7104_0701_01_10:
Whenever I try something new and tasty on Pasio,
I immediately think of my mum back home.
ch0243_40_yuri/7104_0701_02_10:
I wish we could enjoy all the yummy food
here together.
ch0243_40_yuri/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s love, isn’t it. When you find yourself thinking
about someone even when you’re far apart.
ch0243_40_yuri/7104_0701_04_10:
Do you have somebody like that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0243_40_yuri/7105_0701_01_10: Hop and Marnie are my friends from Galar.
ch0243_40_yuri/7105_0701_02_10:
And since coming to Pasio, I’ve already made
friends with you as well!
ch0243_40_yuri/7105_0701_03_10:
You’ve no idea how happy that makes me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_40_yuri/7105_0701_04_10:
I hope my circle of friends will continue to get
bigger and bigger!
ch0243_40_yuri/1701_0701_01_10:
Look what I found on the beach earlier!
If you like it, it’s yours!
ch0243_40_yuri/1701_0702_01_10:
People leave behind all sorts of bits and bobs on
the beach. I’ll let you know if I find anything else!
ch0243_40_yuri/2501_0701_01_10:
I tried going for an Inteleon theme with my
new outfit.
ch0243_40_yuri/2501_0701_02_10:
I wanted something cute but also stylish and cool
like my Inteleon! What do you think?
ch0243_40_yuri/2501_0702_01_10: I love dressing up—even when I’m out exploring!
ch0243_40_yuri/2501_0702_02_10:
When my outfit matches my partner Pokémon,
it’s even more fun!
ch0243_40_yuri/2501_0702_03_10:
You should try it sometime, too! I bet your
Pokémon would get a kick out of it!
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0701_01_10: I love camping outdoors! Got that from my mum.
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0701_02_10:
Going on nature walks, cooking over a campfire...
Good times all around.
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0701_03_10:
Hey! Why don’t we pitch a tent on the beach
and do some camping ourselves? We’re already
dressed for the weather!
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0702_01_10:
Have you ever noticed how pretty the stars look
at night from the shore?
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0702_02_10:
I’d love to go out and stargaze while listening to
the sound of the waves...
ch0243_40_yuri/2511_0702_03_10:
A beautiful memory like that would be hard
to forget.
ch0243_40_yuri/3001_0701_01_10:
The weather may be scorching this morning,
but my head’s as cool as an Eiscue!
ch0243_40_yuri/3003_0701_01_10:
The sun reaches its zenith around lunchtime.
Make sure you drink lots of water and stay
cool, OK?
ch0243_40_yuri/3005_0701_01_10:
The ocean feels a bit scary at night, but it’s also
oddly exciting... It’s sort of like the Slumbering
Weald in that way.
